Our online utility billing application gives you access to your account 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. It's a convenient way to pay your bills on your own time - with no waiting!

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/about-us.icon_.png)

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/about-us.icon-2-1.png)

[Click Here to Pay](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/presidiotx/utilities)

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/pexels-shvetsa-4482900-570x380.jpg)

Beginning November 1st, 2024 Utility Rates will increase 2%, and will reflect on the December 2024 utility bill. The City of Presidio Utility Rates will increase by 2% approved by Utility Ordinances; Waste Water Rates Ordinance 2022-12, Water Ordinance 2022-13, and Landfill Ordinance 2022-14 . There is a 2% credit card processing fee for every credit card transaction (On the phone, in person, and/or online payments) will be paid by the customer. The last day to pay your December Utility Bill will be on December 16
. After which a 10% late fee will be added to you bill by ordinance approval.
